home.welcomeSubtitle: We are your solution in difficult situations
home.aboutText1: We are the only company in the world that can issue a loan without any question in just 30 seconds
home.aboutText2: Our company value is the unique hardware and software that facilitates and accelerates the loan process as compared to traditional methods
home.aboutText3: Our proprietary software individually selects the loan amount and the reimbursement rate based on the borrower's credit history
home.aboutText4: CASHSOSWIFTLY develops and operates one of the widest network of automated lending machines around the world
home.dozpText: A mobile application  for online loan disburdement
home.terminalText: Our special terminal for loan disbursement in 30 seconds
home.clickAdvanceText: A mobile application for issuing an advance payment to company employees
home.featureText: We, in Cashsoswiftly, bring two absolute benefits to the societies where we operate
home.featureTitle:
People who borrow money will NOT steal, rob, and violate law in any way.
People who borrow money learn financial responsibility at the lowest stakes.
home.featureItem1:
We give people credit. We trust our client unconditionally
when sometimes no one else trusts him
home.featureItem2: We try to help and we help when there is no other help
home.featureItem3:
Our interest added never grows limitlessly like banking loans.
Therefore, even when our client is in need, he will still repay a
smaller amount compared to banking loan
home.mainFeaturesTitle: microfinance institutions brings following basic benefits to the society
home.featureItemText1: It is very often when banks simply won’t extend loans to those with little or no assets, and generally will not engage in the small size of loans typically associated with microfinancing. Our business is based on the philosophy that even small amounts of credit can help end the cycle of poverty
home.featureItemText2: People who borrow small amounts of money tend to be more responsible to repaying their debts because they act more cautiously
home.featureItemText3: When in trouble, when in need for immediate, instant money – to pay for education, to pay for health services, people do not have time to wait. Therefore, we empower our clients to pay faster when they really need money
home.missionSubtitle:
We strive to become a global leading client-oriented company,
offering convenient access to innovative and competitive financial products
across multiple channels to individuals
home.missionText1: We are dedicated to simplifying, improving, and positively surprising our partners and clients we work with. Hungry to improve, we are curious, we are committed, we care. That's why we put our clients first
home.missionText2: We combine our experience with a hunger for learning. We are focused on innovation to ensure that our products are always ahead of the competition. We seek to improve every aspect of our business through the creativity of our team
home.missionText3: Diversity and difference are what make us stronger. We are committed to attracting the widest range of people and providing an environment where they can flourish. Our blend of people is what sets us apart and we embrace their contributions
home.missionText4: We are a family that values honesty and integrity. Across our network, we treat others in the way we would like to be treated. We empower each person to do what it takes to deliver and we collaborate and engage as one united team. Together we achieve more

about.heading:
From a simple idea
to the International
Fintech Company
about.biography1: 4 years ago, I did not doubt that the future is not only in IT technologies, it’s all about technical solutions allowing to accelerate and facilitate business processes.
about.biography2: We combined efforts with my partner Pavel Grebennikov, the developer of our software, and established a company, which climbed to the top among offline/online payday lending players in Kazakhstan in just 2 years.
about.biography3: The success factor of our company is an innovative full-cycle business model, unique hardware, and software that accelerates and facilitates the loan disbursement process compared to classic lending methods.
about.biography4: The business model turned out to be a great success in Kazakhstan, so we decided to move abroad. We established the international group of companies “CASHSOSWIFTLY” under KREDITOMAT TM, that moved up in the ranks alongside large international FinTech companies.
about.biography5: The companies in CASHSOSWIFTLY Group do not only share business goals, vision, and values, we also share our views on the business processes and focus on steady partnership relations.
about.biography6: We focus on discretion, entrepreneurship, and excellent knowledge of local markets. We do our business in a responsible manner – we observe the laws and our commitments to the state, our partners, and clients.
about.biography7: It is my belief that the implementation of high-tech solutions and products in today realities should be an integral part of the business processes in any country and company aspiring to be the market leader. This way of business management can ensure long-term stable development in modern world
about.valueText1: We know that the trust is fundamental and to be trusted we must remain competent and honest
about.valueText2:
We uncover all product
terms and conditions using simple language on our website and at all points of sale
about.valueText3: We build diverse teams to generate better ideas and act as responsible partners with all our clients to serve the wider interests of society
about.valueText4:
We recognize that ultimately,
we are accountable
to our clients and we focus on maximizing long-term partnership and values
about.teamText1:
CASHSOSWIFTLY is a team of responsible, determined, and motivated people. Our team now
numbers over 1000 people, with knowledge and qualifications meeting the highest criteria
in our industry
about.teamText2:
We have overcome multiple challenges that seemed impossible to get through and that is exactly
what allowed us to become who we are today

products.mobileStep2: Select the loan amount and loan term
products.mobileStep3: Accept the terms of the loan agreement and receive a loan to bank card or it can be withdrawn through our terminal or ATM by code
products.featureText1:
Unique Fintech-product
Innovative in the global market
products.timingFeature:
EFFECTIVELY RECOGNIZES, VERIFIES, REVIEWS THE POTENTIAL CLIENTS AND LENDS MONEY
IN LESS THAN A 1 MINUTE for THE FIRST LOAN AND 30 SECONDS FOR THE NEXT loan
products.mobileTerminal2: Accepts the terms of the loan agreement and receives a loan
products.mobileTerminal3: Spends the received money in the shopping center
products.mobileTerminal4: Our client always comes with money and ready to spend them on shopping
products.itemText1: Our ALM's are "VISIBLE" in shopping centers, metro stations, and most places with traffic
products.itemText2: Places of ALMs location encourage the client to take a loan and make AN IMPULSE PURCHASING
products.itemText3: NO ADVERTISING REQUIRED, one ALM issues up to 500 loans per day
products.itemText4: All processes in ALM are controlled by unique software
products.itemText5:
No need for credit managers
No fraud
products.itemText6: No commissions for withdrawal and repayment
products.fluidText1: - ALM’s shall be located in areas with high traffic
products.fluidText2: - ALM’s shall be installed near the main entrance of shopping malls or supermarkets (large grocery stores in a shopping mall)
products.fluidText3: - ALM’s can be installed in the ATM areas
products.clickStep1: Log in to the mobile application and verify your mobile number
products.clickStep2: Upload your ID documents, take a selfie and click to apply for a salary advance loan
products.clickStep3: Within 2-3 minutes, you'll be notified of your loan approval status
products.clickStep5: Get the money transferred to your bank card or account in 2-3 minutes or it can be withdrawn through our terminal or ATM by code
products.itemText7: Repayment of the loans is guaranteed by the employer company based on the signed contract
products.itemText8: Therefore, we can offer low and favorable interest rates for clients in comparison with other online loan products
products.itemText9: As NPL rates are very low the collection staff and related costs are minimal
products.itemText10: We offer the user a friendly product and get 45-50% loyal clients who constantly use it

partnership.welcomeText1: Sometimes we find ourselves in a condition when we need a push to achieve our goals. Sometimes we reach for a helping hand and feel void. Sometimes we want to test our plans and we need a partner
partnership.welcomeText2: This is what we are, CSS, we can push you for success, we will always lend you a hand and we will partner with you when you are in doubt
partnership.welcomeText3: When our client gets well-off and starts to help others, we will look back at the time, when we were there to help and support
partnership.coopText: We continuously develop our products, using cutting-edge technologies, and conquer the international markets
partnership.coopItemText1:
Are already in the micro-loan market and need
automation, cost optimization, and new customer
acquisition
partnership.coopItemText2:
Are entrepreneurs and want to be part
of the world's most advanced, automated,
client-oriented business model
partnership.coopItemText3:
Are ready for joint activities, sharing all risks and
profits with us and strive for success
partnership.fluidText1:
The process from launching a project to reaching a breakeven point is around
6-8 months and within a year our business model starts to make a profit
partnership.fluidText2: The share of the constant and loyal client's averages at 60% - 75%
partnership.fluidText3:
Advertising and promotion in social media, as well as promotion events,
increase the number of loans by 20%
partnership.modelHeading: How the business model works (the case of alM)
partnership.bModel1: CLIENT is looking for ALM and comes to the mall
partnership.bModel2: CLIENT receives a loan in ALM by cash
partnership.bModel3: CLIENT spends money in the mall
partnership.bModel4: CLIENT comes to the shopping mall again to repay the loan from his salary
partnership.bModel5: CLIENT makes purchases in the mall again for the money from salary
partnership.bModel6: Shopping mall gets more profit and traffic
partnership.bModel7: CLIENT always returns and increases the AVERAGE CHECK
partnership.benefitHeading: the benefits of using this business model
partnership.modelBoxText1:
- Receives a loan and withdraws
the cash
partnership.modelBoxText5:
- The number of purchases of new
and regular clients increases
partnership.modelBoxText9:
- More quality clients due
to mobile scoring
partnership.modelBoxText11:
- The loan is issued
conveniently for the client
